content: my crochet reindeer hat pattern is a perfect accessory for this holiday season i mean what s christmas without one or two reindeer **materials** ▢1 skein of red hearts cafe yarn ▢1 skein of red hearts buff yarn ▢1 skein of red hearts cherry red yarn ▢5 5mm hook **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet blo = back loop only slip_stitch = slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet increase = increase
